item.description:
Am going biking on Nantucket this Sat with another group and thought I would list the event here for anyone interested in attending.

Beach day/trip to Nantucket! A day trip to Nantucket is perfectly doable and a lot of fun.

Tickets for the ferry must be paid for ahead of time as they do sell out! A round trip ticket on the SLOWER ferry is $35. Bikes are an additional $14.

Ferry website: http://www.steamshipauthority.com/ssa/FareDisplay.cfm?Run=NT

We will meet at the ferry terminal on school street at 8:45.

The agenda will include biking, lunch, Siaconset Beach, and dinner  More details to follow

Carpooling groups are encouraged!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at 8:45 at the ticket office on the dock
item.name: Day Trip Biking and Beaching on Nantucket
